full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
#### Solicitation # SSC-23-00013247:T
Shared Services Canada (SSC) hereby announces a tender opportunity for the provision of services related to construction site planning.

#### Key Details:
- **Solicitation #**: SSC-23-00013247:T
- **Solicitation Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
- **Notice Type**: Request for Information
- **Regions**: Canada, with delivery in Alberta
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

#### Tender Status
The tender has expired on 2021-12-14T09:00:00.

#### Contact Information
GianMarco, DeMeis (Admin)
Phone: 613 999 9999
Fax: 613 999 9999
Address: 11 Rue Laurier, Gatineau, QC, A1A 1A1, Canada

#### Important Links
- Note: The Notice URL and attached files are not available.

#### About this Tender
Shared Services Canada invites qualified service providers to submit their Information Request (RFP) for the provision of construction site planning services related to their ongoing projects within the Alberta region.

#### Scope of Work
The service provider shall be responsible for conducting a thorough site analysis, developing a comprehensive site plan, and providing on-site construction management to ensure compliance with all relevant regulations and standards.

#### Evaluation Criteria
Please refer to the BC, BCT – Q, RO Soppes for a detailed description of evaluation criteria.

#### Submission Instructions
For more information on submission procedures, RFP timelines, and evaluation criteria, please refer to the solicitation package.

**Note**: Please confirm the solicitation package is up-to-date prior to initiating any contact or submissions.

Submission of proposals closes 1 week prior to the deadline noted above. Submission periods may be extended or shortened with notice. Tenderers should not assume otherwise. A detailed description regarding abstract items & any agreements in regards of Treasury Board renewals relate about this solicitation.
